forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 47. West northwest wind 2 to 6 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 56, with temperatures falling to around 54 in the afternoon. North northeast wind 2 to 6 mph.

weather_report:
As nighttime envelops Downtown San Francisco, a cloak of clouds lingers overhead, bringing with it a coolness that seems to whisper secrets of the bay. The air is presently calm, with the soft caress of a gentle breeze maintaining just enough movement to keep things feeling fresh. The temperature is settling into the low 40s, inviting those out and about to layer up and embrace the cozy layers that the season affords.

As Saturday dawns, we are promised a delightful transformation. The sun will break through the murky shroud, peeking out with a promise of warmth that lingers lightly in the mid-50s. The afternoon will bring a slight fading in temperature, but the calm northern breeze will make for a serene backdrop. For those contemplating their plans, a jaunt through the local parks or a leisurely stroll along the waterfront could be the perfect way to savor this beautiful calm. A light jacket or a warm cardigan will suffice, but make sure to wear comfortable shoes—there's beauty to be uncovered in the details of this magnificent city.
